mapper.select: select distinct m.permission from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on (r.id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.id = ur.user_id) left join t_role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.id) left join t_menu m on (m.id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.permission is not null and m.permission <> ''
